dmca.title: Application DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
We have noticed that your  
website,https://market.android.com/details?id=com.appmakr.app230955&feature=search_result
 
is displaying, promoting and/or offering Data/Application content from the
 
2011 Tour de France. All copyright in such images are vested in ASO.

As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from ASO to use this  
content your present use is a clear infringement of the ASO's rights and  
patently infringes the copyright held in that content. Please immediately 

cease all such infringements on any and all of the data you own and/or  
control and confirm to us via email that you have done so.

Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an 

express or implied waiver of any of ASO's rights or remedies, including
any  
rights or remedies in respect of infringement not explicitly stated,  
whether current or in the future, all of which are expressly reserved.

Formal Declaration

I hereby state that Amaury Sports Organisation owns and controls the  
exclusive rights to the Data/Application content referenced above and that
 
NetResult is authorized to act on behalf of ASO with respect to internet  
monitoring and compliance related to infringement of such rights.

I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of
Data/Application  
such content in the manner complained of is not authorised by ASO, its  
agents, or the law.
